Module pipeline
Package tcpassos.pipeline

Interface BasePipeline<BEGIN,END>

Type Parameters:
BEGIN - Pipeline input element type
END - Pipeline output element type
All Known Subinterfaces:
AsyncPipeline<BEGIN,END>, AsyncPipeline.Branched<BEGIN,END>, BranchedPipeline<BEGIN,END>, CircularPipeline<T>, MergeablePipeline<BEGIN,END,P,P_END>, ParallelPipeline<BEGIN,END>, Pipeline<BEGIN,END>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomicPipeline
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface BasePipeline<BEGIN,END>
Base of a pipeline, which supports the processing of an input element, returning an output element.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default END
    execute()
    Executes the pipeline without an input element
    END
    execute(BEGIN obj)
    Processes an input element through the pipeline stages, returning a processed output element
